name: Black and Orange: Black Pepper-Crusted Sliced Steak with Crème Fraîche Sweet Potato Mash
description: [Photograph: Kerry Saretsky] For a Halloween main course, I love this spicy black steak with sweet orange mash. The steak is done simply—just crusted in black pepper, and seared to medium-rare, then sliced. The mash, mixed from russet potatoes...
